Attribute.Name: Calculated Weight
Attribute.ValueTemplate:
<derive expr="{
    value1:=IF(PRODUNIT('TradeItemWeight')="kg",value('TradeItemWeight', 'unece.unit.LBR'),
        IF(PRODUNIT('TradeItemWeight')="lb",value('TradeItemWeight', 'unece.unit.KGM'),
            IF(PRODUNIT('TradeItemWeight')="g",value('TradeItemWeight', 'unece.unit.ONZ'),
                IF(PRODUNIT('TradeItemWeight')="oz",value('TradeItemWeight', 'unece.unit.GRM'),
                    ""
                )
            )
        )
    ),
    value2:=if(round(value1, 2)="0","0",round(value1, 2))
}concatenate(
    value2,
     IF(
        PRODUNIT('TradeItemWeight')="kg",
        " lb",
        ""
    ),
    IF(
        PRODUNIT('TradeItemWeight')="lb",
        " kg",
        ""
    ),
    IF(
        PRODUNIT('TradeItemWeight')="g",
        " oz",
        ""
    ),
    IF(
        PRODUNIT('TradeItemWeight')="oz",
        " g",
        ""
    )
)"/>

MetaData.Value: It is used to store the converted MaxTemp Value.
